mapper.select:
SELECT t.package_id packageId, d.id id,d.file_name fileName,t.pro2Id, t.pro2Name, prefix as prefix, file_path as fileUrl, create_time FROM ent_datum_bundle_detail d INNER JOIN ( SELECT id AS bundleId, t.package_id, t.pro2Id, t.pro2Name FROM ent_datum_bundle INNER JOIN ( SELECT package_id, res_id, t.pro2Id, t.pro2Name FROM ent_package_res join ( SELECT ep.id packageId, pro2.id pro2Id, pro2.name pro2Name FROM ent_package ep JOIN ent_college_projs projs ON ep.college_proj_id = projs.id JOIN ent_proj_2nd pro2 ON pro2.id = projs.proj_2nd_id WHERE projs.id in (31,60,61,62,136,155,511,641,1001,1285,1286,1293,1884)
) t on package_id = t.packageId AND res_type_code = 'DATUM' AND delete_flag = 0 ) t ON id = t.res_id WHERE status_code = 'AVAILABLE' AND delete_flag = 0 GROUP BY bundleId ) t ON d.bundle_id = t.bundleId AND d.delete_flag = 0;
